intro: This is the main content of the website.

hero.kicker: Custom AI operations ¬∑ built for you by Primex
hero.body: We design custom AI agents that connect to your ERP, product data, logistics, and service workflows ‚Äî built on 40+ years of operational know-how.
hero.statsText: From 90-minute claim cases to 70-second automated resolutions ‚Äî without extra headcount.
hero.rightBody: We co-design every agent with your teams, so each workflow stays compliant with your ERP, marketplaces, and service SLAs.

items.title: AI Automation & Virtual Assistants
items.description: We blueprint, train, and operate AI agents that automate claims, order verification, logistics updates, and ERP tasks‚Äîalways with human-in-the-loop controls and 40+ years of operational know-how.

items.title: Operational Services
items.description: Back-office teams manage order processing, logistics coordination, procurement, and compliance across the furniture supply chain.

items.title: Customer Support
items.description: Multilingual service desks handle inquiries, after-sales care, claims, and retention programs across every channel.

items.title: E-commerce & Product Data
items.description: Product Data Management & Content: We organize catalogs, improve content, adapt pricing for local markets, and publish to market markets, PIM, and ERP systems.

items.title: Design & 3D Visualization
items.description: Designers create marketing assets, high-end renderings, 3D room planners, and immersive visuals that move your brand.

items.title: IT Development & Technical Consulting
items.description: Engineers integrate ERPs/CRMs, build custom software, and advise on cybersecurity, infrastructure, and automation roadmaps.

fields.privacyLabel: I have read and accept the Privacy Policy

legal.title: Recruitment Privacy Policy
legal.intro: We value your trust and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy explains how we handle your information during the recruitment process.

sections.typesText: We collect personal data that you provide to us directly. This includes: Identifiers (Name, Email, Phone, Address), Professional Information (CV/Resume, Cover Letter, Portfolio, Employment History, Education, Certifications), and Social Media Profiles (e.g., LinkedIn). We may also collect data from interviews or coding tests.
sections.purposeText: Your data is processed solely for recruitment purposes: To evaluate your qualifications for the role; To communicate with you regarding your application and interview schedule; To verify your information and conduct background checks (where legally permissible); and to improve our recruitment process.
sections.basisText: We process your personal data based on your consent (when you apply) and our legitimate interest in finding qualified candidates. If you are hired, the processing will be based on the necessity to enter into an employment contract.
sections.sharingText: Your data is strictly confidential. It is accessible only to our internal HR team and hiring managers. We may share data with trusted third-party service providers (e.g., Applicant Tracking Systems, Cloud Storage) who process data on our behalf under strict confidentiality agreements. We do not sell your data.
sections.retentionText: If your application is successful, your data will be transferred to our employee file. If unsuccessful, we retain your data for a period of up to 12 months to consider you for future opportunities. After this period, your data will be securely deleted unless you request earlier deletion.
sections.securityText: We implement industry-standard technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, loss, or alteration. This includes encryption, access controls, and regular security audits.
sections.rightsText: You have the right to: Request access to the personal data we hold about you; Request correction of inaccurate data; Request deletion of your data ('Right to be Forgotten'); Withdraw your consent at any time; and Object to processing based on legitimate interests.
sections.contactText: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact our Data Protection Officer at privacy@company.com.
